channel.title: PimpScape Help
channel.description:
Im pretty new to coding and ive just started a pimpscape based server most things are running fine except for one annoying thing. Some monsters, the black dragons ive made seem to attack with a weird blue spell and it hits HUGE and is quite annoying how can i change the way monsters attack ive looked everywhere for a tutorial and can i change the max hit of the monsters? reply asap or email mike_lfc08@hotmail.co.uk =D
If this is wrong section please move

Read full topic

item.title: PimpScape Help
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

for the first error/problem

im currently using pimpscape to, i just deleted the blk drags and such, to make money making harder, so that is one way

for the second error/problem

go to your npc.cfg
to open this open up notepad then drag and drop npc.cfg onto the notepad and it will pop up this

//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat--health npc = 0 Hans 0 0 npc = 1 Man 2 7 npc = 2 Man 2 7 npc = 3 Man 2 7 npc = 4 Woman 2 0 npc = 5 Woman 2 0 npc = 6 Woman 2 0 npc = 7 Farmer 7 12 npc = 8 Thief 16 17 npc = 9 Guard 21 22 npc = 10 Guard 22 0 npc = 11 Tramp 2 0 npc = 12 Barbarian 7 0 npc = 13 Wizard 9 0 npc = 14 Druid 33 0 npc = 15 Warrior_woman 24 0 npc = 16 Man 2 0 npc = 17 Barbarian_woman 8 0 npc = 18 Al-Kharid_warrior 9 0 npc = 19 White_Knight 36 0 npc = 20 Paladin 62 0 npc = 21 Hero 69 0 npc = 22 Forester 15 0 npc = 23 Knight_of_Ardougne 46 0 npc = 24 Man 2 0 npc = 25 Woman 2 0 npc = 26 Knight_of_Ardougne 46 0 npc = 27 Archer 37 0 npc = 28 Zoo_keeper 0 0 npc = 29 Chuck 1 0 npc = 30 Barman 0 0 npc = 31 Priest 0 0 npc = 32 Guard 20 0 npc = 33 Door_man 0 0 npc = 34 Watchman 33 0 npc = 35 Soldier 28 0 npc = 36 Wyson_the_gardener 0 0 npc = 37 Sigbert_the_Adventurer 0 0 npc = 38 Shipyard_worker 11 0 npc = 39 Shipyard_worker 11 0 npc = 40 Shark 1 0 npc = 41 Chicken 1 3 npc = 42 Sheep 0 0 npc = 43 Sheep 0 0 npc = 44 Duck 1 0 npc = 45 Duck 1 0 npc = 46 Duckling 1 0 npc = 47 Rat 1 0 npc = 48 Oomlie_Bird 46 0 npc = 49 Hellhound 122 240 npc = 50 King_black_dragon 276 950 npc = 51 Baby_dragon 48 0 npc = 52 Baby_blue_dragon 48 0
etcâ€¦

find the npc id number of that and mess around with the hp and cb, higher the hp the higher the hits

Read full topic
